main.title: Bankist App
main.stack: Built using HTML, CSS and JavaScript
main.text: BANKIST is a fintech app that allows easy and fast transactions between users.
about: - View the optimal layout for the site depending on their device's screen size
- See hover states for all interactive elements on the page
- Login using DEMO accounts
- Transfer and Receive money from one DEMO account to another
- View updated transactions and Account balance

main.title: Pig Game
main.stack: Built using HTML, CSS , JavaScript and Jquery
main.text: Pig Game if a fun and easy game which can be played between two people.
about: - Each player can keep on Rolling the dice and keep increasing your current score, until you roll the Number 1
-When a player rolls the number 1, you immediately lose all the points in your current score and the next player becomes the active Player.
- To avoid losing all your points, A player can click on 'Hold'.
- This will immediately add your current score to your Total Score,  and the next player becomes the active Player.
A player is declared the winner when he has a Total score of 100.
